item.title: 特朗普钢铁关税威胁加剧亚洲金属供应过剩
item.description: 如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）继续对美国进口的所有金属征收全面关税，越南和印度等快速增长的亚洲钢铁生产国就有可能受到损害。【原文：Vietnam and India are among fast-growing Asian steel producers at risk of being hurt if President Donald Trump goes ahead with blanket tariffs on all US imports of the metal.】

item.title: 中国人民银行在现金紧张的情况下注入本月最多短期资金
item.description: 周五，中国央行加大了向金融系统注入短期资金的力度，试图缓解扰乱中国债券市场的资金紧张局面。【原文：China’s central bank increased injection of short-term funds into the financial system on Friday, in an attempt to ease a cash crunch that has roiled the nation’s bond market.】

item.title: 上田警告日本央行可介入平滑市场，日本收益率下跌
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示愿意干预债券市场以平息收益率飙升，并重申了央行支持稳定市场的长期承诺。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda signaled a readiness to intervene in the bond market to quell a surge in yields, reiterating the central bank’s long-standing commitment to supporting stable markets.】

item.title: 印尼将出售债券为普拉博沃的廉租房目标提供资金
item.description: 印度尼西亚计划出售政府债券，为低收入住房项目提供资金，中央银行同意在二级市场购买这些债券。【原文：Indonesia plans to sell government bonds to finance low-income housing projects, with the central bank agreeing to buy the debt in the secondary market.】

item.title: 台积电飙升，台湾考虑取消 ETF 权重上限
item.description: 台湾金融监管机构正在考虑取消单一股票在追踪指数的本地交易所交易基金市值中所占比例的上限。【原文：Taiwan’s financial regulator is considering lifting a cap that a single stock can take up in the market capitalization of local exchange-traded funds that track indexes.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院对 X 罚款，命令 Rumble 任命法律代表
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）对 X 公司处以新的罚款，同时命令另一家在美国起诉他的社交媒体公司在南美国家指定一名法律代表。【原文：Brazil Supreme Court Judge Alexandre de Moraes slapped X with a new fine while ordering another social media company that sued him in the US to appoint a legal representative in the South American nation.】

item.title: 新西兰央行欢迎奇异币走低成为振兴经济的催化剂
item.description: 新西兰央行对汇率走低表示欢迎，称这将有助于振兴今年的经济增长。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank is welcoming a weaker exchange rate, saying it will help to revive economic growth this year.】

item.title: 日本加藤警告：债券收益率上升可能对财政造成压力
item.description: 在 10 年期基准收益率创下 15 年来的最高水平之后，日本财政部长警告说，国债收益率的上升可能会给日本本已紧张的财政带来压力。【原文：Rising government bond yields may strain Japan’s already tight finances, the nation’s finance minister warned, after the 10-year benchmark yield hit its highest level in 15 years.】

item.title: 避险需求强劲，黄金将实现第八周上涨
item.description: 由于地缘政治和贸易紧张局势以及对经济前景的担忧加剧了避险需求，黄金接近创纪录水平，并有望连续第八周上涨。【原文：Gold held near a record — on pace for an eighth straight weekly advance — on increasing haven demand fueled by geopolitical and trade tensions, as well as concerns about the economic outlook.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前韩国早期出口萎靡不振
item.description: 本月迄今为止，韩国的出口势头有所减弱，使 2025 年的经济前景黯淡下来，政治动荡和唐纳德-特朗普关税计划的潜在影响为韩国经济蒙上了阴影。【原文：South Korea’s exports have lost momentum so far this month, dimming the 2025 outlook for an economy overshadowed by political turmoil and the potential impact of Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】

item.title: 日本通胀加速，令日本央行继续加息
item.description: 日本通胀加速超过预期，创下自 2023 年夏季以来的最快增速，使日本央行有望进一步上调基准利率。【原文：Japan’s inflation accelerated more than expected, rising at the fastest pace since the summer of 2023 and keeping the Bank of Japan on track to raise its benchmark interest rate further.】
